Name: maximize_velocity
Description: Aim to maximize average sprint velocity over time

Name: maximize_team_utilization
Description: Maximize the productive use of worker availability

Name: minimize_burnout_risk
Description: Minimize cognitive load and overtime to reduce burnout risk

Name: maximize_requirement_clarity
Description: Improve clarity of user stories by reducing ambiguity

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the percentage of sprints achieving their goal

Name: minimize_technical_debt
Description: Reduce accumulation of technical debt over iterations

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Increase stakeholder influence satisfaction through feedback integration

Name: maximize_backlog_grooming_rate
Description: Increase the frequency and completeness of backlog refinement

Name: minimize_blocker_duration
Description: Minimize the average time blockers remain unresolved

Name: maximize_documentation_coverage
Description: Maximize the ratio of documented features to implemented features

Name: maximize_cross_functionality
Description: Encourage skill diversity within teams to improve resilience

Name: minimize_release_delay
Description: Minimize deviation from planned release dates
